name: Charlie
shortDescription: Charlie is a calm, even tempered dog who gets along well with children and other animals.

name: Rover
shortDescription: Rover is high-strung and full of energy.

name: Spot
shortDescription: Spot is very sweet and loves to cuddle.

name: Nora
shortDescription: Nora is an adorable and energetic puppy.

name: Balto
shortDescription: Balto loves people and the outdoors.
